channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 BIOS

item.title: CVE-2022-3728|2024-08-03T01:20:57.786Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20t14s%20gen%203%20bios
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 and X13 Gen3 that could cause the BIOS tamper detection mechanism to not trigger under specific circumstances which could allow unauthorized access.
